name: Toy App Project - Geocoding and google maps with fragmenty layouts
body:
# Toy App 
## Geocoding and Google Maps, with Android

This Project displays asynchronous calls to a toy-api, this api is full of countries/ areas and people in areas. The project shows the areas on a map, and figures lat/long and area names from reverse geocoding.

## Images
![Main Window](http://i.imgur.com/2Iu5zRo.png)

![Area Window](http://i.imgur.com/EFW5fqA.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
